attributes.review: this app took SO long to download and when it finally did it was so confusing and horrible. i would NOT recommend wasting your tome on such a disappointing app.

attributes.review: Honestly this app just promotes hate. It’s very badly designed, so confusing, and all around an awful app. It should be removed from the AppStore because it doesn’t meet the expectations of what a good app promotes to be.
attributes.title: Mike pence

attributes.review: THIS APP IS OUTRAGEOUS. it hacked into all of my kitchen appliances. out of nowhere my blender started going at 3 AM. this app also hacks into your television, radios, and even your GARAGE. yup I said it. it opened my garage door and someone weird man came in to PROMOTE THIS APP. ugh. such a waste of time🙄
attributes.title: don’t get this app😡😡

attributes.review: So I originally downloaded this app to show my complete support for this pedophi- I mean president oops lol. But as soon as I opened the app it asked for my phone number...eww gross. Sorry, I just don’t feel comfortable handing out my info like that. Xoxo 😚
attributes.title: No♥️
